input: Which one among the following is not guaranteed by the Constitution of India?

options.A: Freedom to move freely throughout the country
options.B: Freedom to assemble peacefully without arms
options.C: Freedom to own, acquire and dispose property anywhere in the country
options.D: Freedom to practice any trade or profession

explanation: The Indian Constitution does not recognize property right as a fundamental right. In the year 1978, the 44th amendment eliminated the right to acquire, hold and dispose of property as a fundamental right.
